text:
San Francisco Sr. Full Stack Engineer @CircleUp

We're building a new kind of investment platform that is changing how entrepreneurs all across the country build their businesses. Our tech stack is Python/Django/MySQL on the backend (we're starting to get some pretty amazing results with Machine Learning in Python as well) and Javascript/jQuery & SASS on the Frontend (we're experimenting with AngularJS there).

https://circleup.com/jobs/senior-engineer/
